about_the_game:
YASUKE: A Lost Descendant is a diverse high speed hack ‘n’ slash action anime game, featuring immersive parkour movement that allows the player to enjoyably traverse the environment and defeat enemies with the playstyle of their choice. This story oriented game will partake you through the trials and tribulations of our protagonist "Tanaka Yasuke" and his mission to end the tyranny over N10N-KOKU, which is currently in the hands of the ODA Clan.
This in-depth story will introduce characters from the past to present, ranging from multiple cultural backgrounds and regions across this new original world.
Join alongside the fight against Nobusora Oda, and learn more about this extensive world that begins with YASUKE: A Lost Descendant.

Gameplay Overview

Our gameplay includes a range of mechanics that are also featured in games loved by many, however spinning and merging them in a way that’ll keep players captivated towards YASUKE!

Defeat enemies with a unique “Stance Switching” system that incorporates 3 different fighting styles for Tanaka -> each with unique combos and skill sets!
(Lion, Cheetah and Rhino)
Command your team to aid you in battle with various abilities that can work differently depending on the enemy.

Combat, Abilities and Parkour

Use one of Tanaka’s main abilities (Shiryoku) to your advantage in both combat or movement. During a battle, this ability can be used to either damage your enemies by pulling in and pushing nearby objects, or even using them against each other! However during free roaming and parkour, the player can use this ability to traverse and swing from building to building by pulling themselves with said power.

Each combat stance will come with 3 abilities, your defensive and offensive abilities as well as your STYLE attack (Ultimate Attack). The player can pick from a selection of each after unlocking new ones within the skill tree; each stance having its own specific to choose from that correlates to the stance.

The STYLE attacks can either be a solo Tanaka ultimate or a group ultimate including the two supporting cast, this is the player’s decision on their preferred playstyle.
As for movement and parkour, traverse the environment with a range of methods that include vaulting, wall-running, rail grinding, swinging and more!

content_descriptors.notes: Acts of violence in an animated manner rather than realistic.
